title: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69
medium: Brush and brown and red-brown watercolor, black ink on white paper, ruled in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on each ruled line with numbers:  1 through 36
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Life-size cartoon of partial Hebrew text in three lines with pomegranate at upper right.  Verso, small sketch, possibly layout of text on curtain.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69.Brush and brown and red-brown watercolor, black ink on white paper, ruled in graphite. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-73-e.
